original_text: And this know, that if the goodman of the house had known what hour the thief would come, he would have watched, and not have suffered his house to be broken through.
korean_text: 너희도 아는 바니 집 주인이 만일 도둑이 어느 때에 이를 줄 알았더라면 그 집을 뚫지 못하게 하였으리라

sentences.original_text: that if goodman of the house had known
what hour the thief would come
and not have suffered his house to be broken through
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 자신의 집이 뚫리는 것을 허락하지 않았을 것이다
